text: Great North Eastern Railway (GNER) was a British train operating company, owned by Sea Containers Ltd. It operated high-speed express train services on the East Coast Main Line from 1996 until the takeover in 2007 of the franchise by National Express East Coast on 9 December 2007. == References == Category:Defunct railway companies of the United Kingdom Category:1996 establishments in England Category:2007 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:21st-century disestablishments in England
title: Great North Eastern Railway
